recipe.title: Multi-Purpose Natural Herbal Blend Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: muslin reusable tea bag, or reusable cotton

steps.step: Combine mint, chamomile, rose petals, and lavender in a bowl.
Scoop 2 tablespoons, or desired amount, into each tea bag and seal completely.
Store in an airtight container and use as you’d like.
